summary:
A facilitator by nature, never taking the same route twice. Assuming that every move fits a system, I will always question the current system in order to improve it. Driven by curiosity and the aim to decrease social inequality.

There are a few activities in life that I would love do all day long and every day. They mostly combine social interaction and a pursuit to increase efficiency. Professionally this includes facilitating a team or a process or unravelling systems to enhance organizational effectiveness.
In my spare time, I love to develop these skills by playing team sports and board games.

Kijk op de website hoe deze kerstcadeautjes eruit zien.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Thijs', 'last_name': 'van Bemmel', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-founder at Kairos'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Nina', 'last_name': 'Schoolenberg', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Maître bij Café De Klepel'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Hinke', 'last_name': 'Vos', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Organisatiebureau Vos&vanTol, Hinke in de keuken, www.eropuitjes.nl'}]}, {'title': 'NSK Knotsbal', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'description': 'Secretary in the organisation of the Dutch Student Knotsbal Championships', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Thijs', 'last_name': 'van Bemmel', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-founder at Kairos'}]}, {'title': 'MSc thesis at the Development Economics group (WUR)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': '“On how gender determines market strategies and outcomes in rural Sierra Leone”

The explorative case study in this thesis examines an experimental game that was carried out during spring 2013 in the rural southeast of Sierra Leone.
The quantitative data was collected simultaneously in a joined research of Wageningen 				University, Cambridge University, Chicago University and Njala University.
This thesis aims to explore which insights can be gained by adding qualitative methods to a quantitatively designed experimental research.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Thijs', 'last_name': 'van Bemmel', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-founder at Kairos'}]}, {'title': 'Viafrica (External relations manager)', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': 'As a external relations manager, I am responsible for expanding existing and creating new partnerships. These partnerships have three main purposes:
1) Exchanging knowledge. Partners like Accenture, IT-staffing and Brunel offer Viafrica their expertise by providing us with their professionals pro bono.
2) Generating income. By crowdfund campaigns and via the PC-Donation campaign (www.pc-donatie.nl)
3) Branding Viafrica as the frontrunner of social enterprises in The Netherlands.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Thijs', 'last_name': 'van Bemmel', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Co-founder at Kairos'}]}]

Futureproof.community is een online B2B platform waar bedrijven die willen verduurzamen connecties leggen met bedrijven die ze daarbij kunnen helpen. Denk aan een reststroom plastic die een nieuwe invulling bij een plastic-printer vindt of een bakkerij die een duurzame verpakking vindt voor zijn koekjes.

Momenteel focus ik me op de verkoop van Cirkels, subcommunities van Futureproof.community. Cirkels bieden programma's, overheden en sectoren een online plek om uitdagingen te bundelen en etaleren. Deze cirkels worden opgemaakt naar wens van de partner, en de uitdagingen zijn direct verbonden met de 10.000+ leden. Dit scheelt de klant het bouwen van een website en de investering in een online community. Voorbeeld: zie link. Bel me vooral voor de mogelijkheden.", 'title': 'Business developer', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}, {'location': 'Utrecht Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'MVO Nederland', 'description': 'In deze rol ben ik op zoek naar bedrijven die zo min mogelijk natuurlijk kapitaal willen verbruiken of dit zelfs willen opbouwen. Natuurlijk kapitaal is de voorraad van alle hernieuwbare en niet-hernieuwbare natuurlijke hulpbronnen (zoals lucht, water, zonlicht, mineralen en plant- en diersoorten) die samen in een toevoer van diensten voorzien die de welvaart en het welzijn van mensen ondersteunen. Denk hierbij aan ecosystemen die het land van boeren vruchtbaar houden, water dat nodig is in de kleding industrie, enzovoorts.
Ken jij bedrijven die hiermee bezig zijn? Stuur me vooral een bericht en maak kans op een taart.', 'title': 'Community Booster Natuurlijk Kapitaal', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 22572, 'name': 'Rainforest Alliance', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGbFgEn-L0zlA/company-logo_400_400/0/1630571404928/rainforest_alliance_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=AuN6oJ8Q3_n4-93eNg0aFSVuV62WX3YEYR9DM9Y3HvU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/rainforest-alliance/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Rainforest Alliance', 'description': None, 'title': 'Consultant at the Innovation Department', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}]}, {'company': {'id': 228382, 'name': 'MDF Training & Consultancy', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEU3FpFrNEtLw/company-logo_400_400/0/1657197891479/mdf_training__consultancy_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=CcbQBwOBAtudv2_QpvGl-hPAbi7hlqS9HaO6nD4oJBk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mdf-training-&-consultancy/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Ede, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'MDF | Empowering People, Creating Impact', 'description': "MDF has over 30 years of experience in providing management training, advisory and evaluation services worldwide. They believe in building on existing knowledge and experiences to create long-lasting effects. MDF's services are diverse but have three things in common – they are inspired by new concepts and theories, are practical, and lead to new insights. The tools and approaches we utilise are directly implementable. This way MDF empowers individuals, organisations and networks to increase their positive social impact.

Together with MDF, BemBem developed the Enterprising Project Design course. This course supports social organisations that want to become more independent of external funds and grants. Participants learn how to turn current trends into opportunities, source and use inspiration from best practices and get started with designing projects that make financial sense.", 'title': 'Freelance Trainer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 18861723, 'name': 'Plant Based Cheese', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGhCkHPgwhknA/company-logo_400_400/0/1644234229830/willicroft_plantbasedcheese_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=wJjvaHXu39dEck_EPKv9OOvUg2biQdTHaIDr98KYQ3E', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/willicroft-plantbasedcheese/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Willicroft', 'description': 'Cheese is so good it’s addictive, and hard to imagine living without. Whether you’re trying to consume fewer animal products, dairy intolerant, health conscious, or just excited about new foods, Plant Based Cheese is out to prove that their plant-based cheese is just as satisfyingly delicious as it’s dairy-based counterpart. 
Using a variety of nut and tofu-based recipes they have created flavours and textures that are perfect additions to your cheese plate, recipes, and even your cheeky midnight snack. They’re packed full of protein, healthy fats and plenty of other nutrients to keep your gut as happy as your tastebuds.

volunteer_experiences: [{'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Board Member', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Collectief Walden', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFsYqSILGBMug/company-logo_400_400/0/1630489834208?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=x4wErccvwWazKJDDRe7TLWUVV3Z1IYGGe_ESMwwp0xc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/collectief-walden/'}, 'cause': 'ARTS_AND_CULTURE', 'description': 'Collectief Walden maakt performances en installaties op het snijvlak van kunst, filosofie en wetenschap vanuit de overtuiging dat wetenschap kunst kan inspireren en kunst wetenschap invoelbaar kan maken.
